title: CC4Me lessons learned improvements from Will's install
description: Implement improvements to CC4Me template repo based on Will's install experience: (1) Central config file, (2) Session name consistency, (3) PATH fixes for launchd, (4) --dangerously-skip-permissions option, (5) cloudflared install timeout, (6) Webhook auto-registration, (7) Script naming (setup.sh alias).

actions.note: Dave requested improvements based on Will's install lessons learned. Working on upstream CC4Me template repo.

Implemented on feature/central-config branch: shared config.sh, session name fix, init timeout, setup.sh alias, --skip-permissions flag, PATH fix. PR #9 created at https://github.com/RockaRhyme/CC4Me/pull/9
